Can I use this to change the background to a blend of colours sometime in the middle of a game or at the end? I am really new to coding.  (It is the script from my colourblend game-start background edited of specific colours for clarity.
<colourblend />
    <colourblendtop type="stringlist">
      <value>colour</value>
      <value>colour</value>
      <value>colour</value>
      <value>colour</value>
      <value>colour</value>
    </colourblendtop>
    <colourblendbottom>colour</colourblendbottom>
    <defaultforeground>colour</defaultforeground>
    <defaultbackground>colour</defaultbackground>
Posts.HTML: Can I use this to change the background to a blend of colours sometime in the middle of a game or at the end? I am really new to coding. (It is the script from my colourblend game-start background edited of specific colours for clarity.
